# textureSemantic

**Type Property**

The intended use of the object’s texture property.

## Declaration

```swift
static let textureSemantic: TextureResource.Semantic
```

## Accessing texture data

- **texture**: An optional image texture for defining the property.

items.description: An optional image texture for defining the property.
